snippet: The Colorado Supreme Court refused to reinstate Ward L. Churchill as a University of Colorado professor despite his contention that he was dismissed because of his political views.
abstract: Colorado Supreme Court refuses to reinstate Ward L Churchill as a University of Colorado professor despite his longstanding contention that he was dismissed in 2007 because of his controversial political views, not academic plagiarism; Churchill had created a national uproar when he compared some victims of the Sept 11 attacks to a Nazi.
lead_paragraph: The Colorado Supreme Court refused to reinstate Ward L. Churchill as a University of Colorado professor despite his contention that he was dismissed because of his political views.

headline.main: Professor’s Dismissal Upheld by Colorado Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Professor’s Dismissal Upheld By Colorado Supreme Court
